entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
